title: Blur Face
description: -Developed a user friendly web application using React.js and Django, allowing users to apply image blurring effects to faces and objects. -Implemented a responsive design to ensure compatibility across various devices, providing a consistent user experience. -Streamlined the image processing functionality with efficient algorithms to enhance performance and deliver faster results.
shortDescription: A web application that allows users to blur faces and objects in images using React.js and Django.

title: Property Website
description: -Developed a comprehensive property management platform using React.js, Node.js, and MySQL. -Designed intuitive CRUD operations to simplify property listing management, enhancing user convenience. -Incorporated secure authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect user data and ensure reliable access.
shortDescription: A platform for managing property listings with secure authentication, built using React, Node.js, and MySQL.

title: PAE Website
description: -Played a key role in developing the PAE website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and React. Focused on creating a highly responsive user interface that delivers a seamless browsing experience. -Optimized the website’s performance by refining code and assets, ensuring faster load times and smooth navigation. -Collaborated closely with cross functional teams to meet client expectations and deliver the project on time.
shortDescription: A fast and responsive Next.js website with a user-friendly interface and optimized performance.

title: Now Yapı Website
description: -Led the frontend development of the Now Yapı website, utilizing React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Swiper to deliver an elegant and user friendly interface. -Designed and implemented interactive image sliders that enhance the visual appeal and improve user interaction. -Integrated JSON data for efficient communication between the frontend and backend, ensuring reliable and accurate data handling. -Worked closely with designers to align the website’s UI/UX elements with the brand’s vision, creating a cohesive and attractive online presence.
shortDescription: An elegant React-based website for a construction company, featuring interactive sliders and seamless UX.

title: Riot Twitch Bot
description: -Designed and developed a Twitch chatbot using Node.js and Axios to access the Riot Games API. -Provided viewers with real time game data for League of Legends and Teamfight Tactics, enhancing interaction during Twitch streams. -Integrated the Twitch API for seamless communication with the chat system, enabling immediate responses to viewer queries. -Focused on optimizing API calls to ensure reliable and up to date data retrieval.
shortDescription: A Twitch bot that provides live game stats for League of Legends and Teamfight Tactics using Riot API.

title: Riot Twitch Bot Website
description: -Created a dedicated website to showcase the Riot Twitch Bot project, enhancing its visibility and engagement. -Built with React.js, HTML5, and CSS3 to provide a visually appealing and responsive design. -Included interactive elements to help users explore and understand the features of the Riot Twitch Bot, fostering community interest and participation.
shortDescription: A showcase website for the Riot Twitch Bot project, featuring interactive elements and responsive design.
